imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Cute little angry panda giving a side-eye look, clean illustration style, transparent background (angry-sideeye-panda.dim_768x768.png)

existing_features.title: In the "LastChanceNoModal" component, remove the user-facing line "That cat is giving you the side-eye right now..." from the modal description so it no longer appears anywhere in the popup UI.

Replace the angry cat in the No modal with a cute little angry panda by updating the modal image to use a new panda asset and updating any related user-facing text/alt text so it no longer refers to a cat.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update angry-animal pop-up: remove the line 'That cat is giving you the side-eye right now...' and replace the cat with a cute little angry panda.

projectName: Update No-modal copy and replace angry cat with cute angry panda
